resources.string: All pill bottles in range will be displayed here, along with their signal strength.
If you cannot find your device, make sure it is in range. You may also try pressing the switch on the sensor, or if all else fails, removing and reinserting the coin cell battery.
Select your device to get started!
Click here to start recording video. Videos will be saved locally in %s.
Here the sensor data will be displayed in real time. Click for additional information.
The icon indicates which device the data comes from.
Swipe to the recording tab to continue.
Slide the button to start collecting data!
The battery status will be displayed here. It will be updated each time you take your pill. Click on the icon for additional information.
